achievements: Wrote hundreds of popular songs including 'God Bless America' and 'White Christmas'
Considered one of the greatest songwriters in American history
Developed the Fisher effect, which explains the relationship between inflation and interest rates
Made significant contributions to monetary theory and econometrics
Co-founded the influential literary magazine *Partisan Review*
Authored important works on American literature and Jewish identity
Founded the neoconservative magazine *The Public Interest*
Influential figure in the development of neoconservatism
Known for his minimalist and elegant portrait photography
His work appeared in *Vogue* magazine for decades
